tool_description: Detailed and interesting facts for thousands of animal species. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/animals.
title: Animals by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/animals
api_list.description: API Ninjas Animals API endpoint. Returns up to 10 results matching the input name parameter.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: common name of animal to search. This parameter supports partial matches (e.g. fox will match gray fox and red fox)
